name: get_the_latest_remote_jobs
description: Fetches the latest 20 remote job listings from a specified company and/or category using the RapidAPI.

company.description: The company name to filter job listings (default is 'shopify').

category.description: The job category to filter job listings (default is None).

name: generate_document_resume
description: Generates a resume document using the provided degree, skills, and university information.

degree.description: The degree to be included in the resume. Defaults to 'Information Systems'.

skills.description: The skills to be included in the resume. Defaults to 'Networking, Web Development'.

university.description: The university to be included in the resume. Defaults to 'Michigan State University'.

name: searchjobs
description: Fetches a list of job postings from the Indeed API for Sweden.

location.description: The city or state within Sweden to search for jobs.

offset.description: The starting point for pagination; must be increased by 10 to retrieve subsequent pages.

keyword.description: The search keyword (e.g., job title or skill).

name: generate_document_cover_letter
description: Generates a cover letter document based on the provided job description and personal information using the AI Resume Generator API.

jobdescription.description: Description of the job position. Default is "Example Co. is looking for a Full Stack Web Developer to maintain and improve our custom web application. The solutions will require both frontend and backend skills. Our web application runs on a LEMP stack. LEMP stack experience is a bonus, but not required."
jobdescription.default: Example Co. is looking for a Full Stack Web Developer to maintain and improve our custom web application. The solutions will require both frontend and backend skills. Our web application runs on a LEMP stack. LEMP stack experience is a bonus, but not required.

university.description: Name of the university where you obtained your degree. Default is "Michigan State University".

skills.description: List of relevant skills. Default is "Networking, Web Development".

jobtitle.description: Title of the job you are applying for. Default is "Full Stack Web Developer".

name: get_a_specific_remote_job_by_id
description: Fetch detailed information about a specific remote job using its ID.

is_id.description: The unique identifier of the job to fetch details for.
